name: Alone (itch) (BunBoi)
description:
It is saturday night, 11PM. You got the graveyard shift for work. 

Watch over the cameras, investigate anything unusual. If everything looks clear at the location, return to the camera room and continue your shift.

This game was made for Callum Upton's game jam! The jam was held for 8 days, but due to circumstances, I only had about a day and a bit to get this game created. I still really wanted to join this jam, and I am very glad I did, it was a lot of fun! Just wish I had more time to polish everything, and add a bit more.

I hope you enjoy this little project.

Known issues:

Not many, just sometimes the doors need an extra E press to open.
